body_html:
When I was using Tenosorflow ver 1.2.1, I can not observe this error.
I seem that some system can observe this error from Tensorflow ver 1.3.0. or Cuda9.0.
And this error occurs only in convolutional operation.

System detail
nvidia drivver varsion: 384.125
gpu : tesla v100 x4
cpu : Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E5-2623 v3 @ 3.00GHz
tensorflow version: 1.5.0
Cuda version: 9.0
Nvidia Docker version: 2

body:
When I was using Tenosorflow ver 1.2.1, I can not observe this error.
I seem that some system can observe this error from  Tensorflow ver 1.3.0. or Cuda9.0.
And this error occurs only in convolutional operation.

System detail 
nvidia drivver varsion: 384.125
gpu : tesla v100 x4
cpu : Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E5-2623 v3 @ 3.00GHz
tensorflow version: 1.5.0
Cuda version: 9.0
Nvidia Docker version: 2
